reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights in this fabulous town and oh so comfortable hotel. The rooms were large, the front desk very friendly and helpful, the location...PERFECT. We saw Etna puffing everyday (missed the last volcanic hiccup by 12 hours). We had a pretty little balcony and overlooked the beautiful sea. The terrace took in miles of coast line and was a fine place to read and relax. I loved the relative luxury of a tub and the breakfast was enough to carry me to an early dinner. I would/will return to this out of the hubbub, but just steps from the Piazza, hotel.
reviews.title: A View From the Terrace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel had everything that was needed for a restful stay. We stayed two nights and had a wonderful breakfast both mornings. The views of Mount Etna from the deck were spectacular. Sitting outside was possible late into the evening without the hustle and bustle of the city bothering you. Our room was clean and large enough for spread out a little.
reviews.title: Wonderful Place To Stay

reviews.text: We stayed for one night and I recommend this hotel. It's very clean, excellent continental breakfast, great locality - 2 mns walk from Umberto Corso.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One needs to note that the room was small and furniture was old but enjoying a small terrace...if I had to come again to Taormina I would stay in this hotel
reviews.title: Enjoy the Terrace!
Enjoyable Change
reviews.text: A unique hotel built into the cliffside of Taormina. Reception/street level is top floor (Floor 2), the rooms are below on Floor 1 and 0. There is a huge terrace on the top floor with awesome views of Mt Etna and Taormina. Hotel has a great location for exploring the town. Exit out on Floor 0 past the breakfast room, and the stairs outside lead to the main Piazza Duomo. Nice breakfast on Floor 0 breakfast room – cereal, yogurt, lots of fruit, breads, fresh ricotta (yummy!), meats & cheeses, pastries, juice & coffee, cappuccino, espresso.
